title: As Depravadas
overview: After escaping from a penitentiary, six women begin a trail of passion and death in the search for survival.

title: Defeat of the Mafia
overview: At the Rome airport two men are taken into custody. Inspector Scott Luce thinks their two suit-cases are full of drugs, but the suit-cases contains only white powder. Afterwards the corpse of Susan Palmer is found. She was a drug runner for the Cosa Nostra boss Frankie Agostino. Susan's friend, Jenny Ryan, meets a mysterious man from America, Arthur Ardigan, supposedly her cousin. In the meantime Inspector Luce is investigating.

title: This Is It... What I Need!
overview: A successful architect travels back home to Thailand in order to oversee the construction of a bridge in a rural village. When he gets there however, he is kidnapped by local gangsters and held hostage. He must find a way to escape, fighting tooth-and-nail and even going as far as deceiving their cruel ringleader.

title: The Liar
overview: Johannes Vig lever et ensomt liv på Sandø. Han er skolelærer og da Sandø i øjeblikket er afskåret fra omverden pga. is må øens befolkning klare sig selv. Johannes er hemmeligt forelsket i både Annemari, købmandens unge datter og i gårdmandskonen Rigmor. Samtidig er Johannes liv meget trøstesløs og det er svært for ham at give sin kærlighed udtryk. Øens liv forstyrres af Harry, en ung ingeniør der gør kur til Annemari. Annemaris kæreste er i øjeblikket på fastlandet, hvorfor det er Johannes der våger over hendes dyd. © Copyright 1997-2012, Lone Hansen & Per Kjær Fredborg

title: School Vandalism
overview: Explores school vandalism by re-creating a true incident involving four youths. Discusses motives and consequence of vandalism.

title: Scotland Yard - the Golden Thread
overview: 1971 NBC documentary by Frank Cvitanovich profiling the various elements of the Metropolitan Police, from the Black Museum to modern riots, to anti-paedophile campaigns.

title: Challenge
overview: U.S. Senate candidate Frank Challenge will not sell out to the Syndicate. As a result, his family is murdered. Then Challenge becomes judge, jury, and executioner.

title: Horrible Rape
overview: Whilst on a picnic a teacher and her young student accidentally stumble across a murder victim and unwittingly become the target of the murderer.

title: The Peeper Part 1
overview: Short film compiled of unused footage from A Scream in the Streets

title: Il picciotto
overview: Eurocrime/Poliziotteschi movie from 1973

title: The Morning of the Fourth Day
overview: A free adaptation from Godard's Breathless that follows Amir, a foul guy who has killed a man in Abadan. He returns to Tehran and continuing his misdeeds trying to convince his girlfriend Zarry to escape with him to the south of Iran.

title: Potluck
overview: A man plans a heist involving drag queens. [Production for this 1970 film was never finished due to a money laundering scheme, though it was released by Vinegar Syndrome as a bonus feature on their Dracula Sucks DVD in 2014, then again on their 4K UHD release in 2022.]

title: Coup Manqué
overview: Short horror film.

title: Hayahoo
overview: Amir, a philosophy student, escapes from the hustle and bustle of the big city to go to the village with his parents for a few days. He decides to teach literacy to the children of the village; But there are people in his way who have villas in the village and are against his methods.

title: The Fever of Lust
overview: A wealthy business executive finds his daughter dead from a drug overdose. A police inspector tries to find the drug dealers.

title: Full utrykning
overview: Is someone really smuggling drugs in our little town? A couple of kids helps the police, without the police's knowing, and is getting themselves into trouble.

title: The Captives
overview: Max C. Kragh, a wealthy industrialist, and his wife Edith are traveling through the hills of Denmark heading toward their weekend retreat, when they see a young girl, Avi, thumbing for a ride. They stop for the girl, and suddenly Max is pulled from the car by two of Avi’s friends, Steen and Jorgen, while Liala watches happily from the other side of the road.  Half crazed with drugs, the young folks kidnap Max and Edith and break into an unoccupied house. Now the hidden, depraved thoughts of the young people are brought out into the open. The night becomes an orgy of lust and terror for Max and Edith, who are subjected to countless indignities.
tagline: They are a side of today's society filled with confusion and hate, untouched by fear.  They were capable of taking two innocent adults and turning them into...THE CAPTIVES

title: An Unusual Story
overview: A young investigator fresh from the university gets assigned an arson case. 18-year-old Epp-Kai has admitted to the crime but he cannot see the girl's motive. His partner, an experienced investigator, already has enough work and doesn't think it's necessary to have further conversations with the accused. The young investigator senses however that Epp-Kai is hiding something.

title: Fugitive Killer
overview: A young boy befriends a man he meets while fishing, not knowing that the man is an escaped killer on the run from the law.

title: Lord Thing
overview: Produced at the height of the black power movement in the early ‘70s, Lord Thing is an insider history into the genesis and transformation of the Conservative Vice Lords gang, one of Chicago's oldest street gangs. Partially shaped and told by by CVL members who also appear in the film, Lord Thing is a unique and powerful tool that expresses an effort in self-transformation during a volatile and violent time in US race history. Gritty and rhythmic, this unusual film reflects an under-told chapter in gang history as members from the West Side neighborhood of North Lawndale try to become viable and political agents in their community. (Chicago Film Archives)

title: Zahltag
overview: A broke-down shipowner robs a money transport with the help of his former employees, then he cheats them out of their share of the loot and, after a failed return to bourgeois life, allows himself to be killed by them; but only after a hunt staged by himself, in which he once again proves his intellectual superiority. First feature film by writer Hans Noever, inspired by Melville's undercooled, stylized gangster dramas.

title: Chronicle of a Crime
overview: This is an omnibus consisting of three stories, all of which deal with deviations of the human psyche. In the story "Waltz", we learn about the first sexual experiences of a man who attends a dancing school in Split. In the story "Ave Maria", a cruel crime destroys a pastoral idyll, and in the story "Seas", we meet a family, living on an isolated island, that goes through an existential crisis ending in murder.

title: The Trojan Horse
overview: A group of art historians has been sent from the spy center in London to the USSR to photograph icons for the publication of an album, but in fact they are engaged in subversive work, building bridges, internal decomposition of the Soviet people, bringing the fall of communism closer.

title: A Family Man
overview: A respectable businessman with a family has a shady past that leads him to commit a murder. Detective Coulter and two forensic scientists try to solve the case.

title: Growing Up in Prison
overview: In 1958, Charles Starkweather went on a murder rampage that left 11 people dead.  He took with him his 14-year-old ex-girlfriend Caril Fugate.  When he was captured, the big question became whether he had kidnapped Caril, or she was his accomplice.  The jury believed she had helped Charlie, and sentenced her to life in prison.  This documentary was made after she had been in prison for more than a decade.

title: I, The Investigator
overview: Near the village of Fasanauri, seriously wounded young man is found, who dies without regaining consciousness. Investigator Giorgi Mikeladze will determine the identity of the deceased according to the recipe found on the spot. The investigator has to work hard to trace the murderer and arrest him.

title: Silent Shores
overview: The fishery supervision employee is killed. During the investigation the public law enforcement official has looked out on the trace of the illegal grouping which has serious reasons for the commission of more considerable crimes than the illegal animals killings.

title: Al-Aneed
overview: Kamal Fahmy is fired from his job in the police force due to his excessive cruelty. At the same time, Abbas, who is accused of killing Officer Kamal's brother, escapes. Nadia plays a role in Kamal Fahmy's life due to her friendship with him. At the same time, she is the sister of the fugitive Abbas. Kamal uses Nadia as bait to hunt down Abbas, but Kamal learns that Zaki Bey has prepared a huge reward for anyone who finds Abbas and brings him to him, dead or alive.

title: The fox and the chameleon
overview: With the jewelry, Naji then betrayed Aziz and handed him over to the police, and Camellia delayed getting her share. Naji had a relationship with his shop worker, Nashwa, and he had previously deprived the hostess, Suhair, of her honor and delayed her marriage.

title: Gąszcz
overview: Colonel of the Citizens' Militia Stefko, after thirty years of absence, arrives in the town which was his place of work right after World War II.

title: Fanta
overview: “An ‘avant-garde’ film of the seventies. A man obssessed with Phantom comics fantasises himself as the contemporary Phantom. Shot on location in Sydney, various Sydney visual artists play characters in this short comic story intercut with images from Phantom comics. Gary Shead is a visual artist who utilised cartoon imagery in his work, hence the idea for this film.” (Screensound)

title: Boots and the Preacher
overview: He preaches while she teaches! Filmed in the Carolinas, A woman and a preacher form a deadly and criminal duo while taking sexual and financial advantage of any who are none the wiser.

title: Kopf oder Zahl
overview: German film.

title: Three Desperados
overview: An orphan boy and his adopted sister attack the Mongol agents that killed their parents.

title: The Whiz Kid and the Mystery at Riverton
overview: A 13-year-old brainiac invents an ingenious listening device, which he uses to bring a crooked city official and his pals to justice

title: Mome Ki Gudiya
overview: Film starring Ratan Chopra, Tanuja and Prem Nath
